name: Space Warrior (tigirillos123)
description:
This is my 2D Shooter Project.

Modifications

1) Added an animated background in the main menu that stays in Loop

2) Applied enemy Spawner to 2 levels, as well as Spawner for asteroids

3) Changed the size of enemies, as well as their health and damage

4) Made some speed modifications to the enemies

5) Added Instructions

Credits

Created by Jose Cruz
